sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Forms() { const [data, setData] = useState({ fname: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', }) const handle = (e) => { const newData = { ...data } newData[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newData) // console.log(data) } const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios .post('/api/contact', { data }) .then((result) => { console.log(result.data) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } return ( <>

handle(e)} id="fname" placeholder="Name" />
handle(e)} type="email" id="email" placeholder="Email Address" />
handle(e)} type="text" id="subject" placeholder="Subject" />

) } export default Forms
